author: Elizabeth Tabler
description:
For fans of Stephen King, there’s a nearly universal question: “How did you feel the first time you read The Stand?” It is the kind of novel one returns to with fresh eyes and older experiences years later. It is an enduring and scarily prescient novel about the ravages of plague, the price of power […]

The post INTERVIEW: Editors Christopher Golden and Brian Keene and anthology contributors appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: INTERVIEW: Editors Christopher Golden and Brian Keene and anthology contributors
